__TOC__

This page is for tracking test results while porting LSB tests to arm.

=== Setup Notes ===
Before starting the tests, install the following packages (and their dependencies):
 lsb
 libqt3-mt-sqlite
 libperl-dev
 libxml-parser-perl
 libxml-sax-perl
 libtest-harness-perl
 libtest-simple-perl

Also, run the following command:
 sudo locale-gen de_DE de_DE@euro en_HK en_PH en_US en_US.ISO-8859-15 en_US.UTF-8 es_ES es_MX fr_FR fr_FR@euro is_IS is_IS.UTF-8 it_IT ja_JP.EUC-JP se_NO ta_IN zh_TW

=== OLVER - Karmic - 20100210 ===
This is a first run after successfully modifying and compiling to run on arm.  This was run against the latest updates for Ubuntu 9.10 (Karmic) on Dove Y0.  Earlier results were inaccurate due to some porting issues.
